name: slack-jira-plugin
description: A Slack plugin that watches channels for messages about JIRA and acts accordingly

SLACK_TOKEN.description: Slack API token - generate one here https://api.slack.com/web

JIRA_PROJECT_KEY.description: Enter the project key from JIRA

JIRA_HOST.description: This will be related to your JIRA_URL

JIRA_USERNAME.description: Be sure to use the username, not the user email

LINK_SEPARATOR.description: use \n if you want to put each link on a new line
